chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> card (Iter_orb m x) = Iter_upb m x

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Iter_orb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => set_minus (fmap_to_set m) (Iter_rem m z) : fmap -> dart -> set
card = fix card (s : set) : nat := match s with | Vs => 0%nat | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s0 x then card s0 else (1 + card s0)%nat end : set -> nat
incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
B_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B m k x = m
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = degree m z
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
period_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m t
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m (Iter (f m) i z)
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) nr z = z
M.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
M.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
upb_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> (0 < Iter_upb m z)%nat
expo1_ex_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in ex_j m z t (p - 1) < -> expo1 m z t
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
